about_the_game: LUYB EARLY ACCESS DEMO VERSION - Hit or Box objects to the beat, dodge obstacles. Enhance strength, endurance, coordination, reflexes. Dance to the Rhythm and Elevate in a virtual world. This demo contains one playable level, three different stages, and three skins. Get a feel for the game!
detailed_description: LUYB EARLY ACCESS DEMO VERSION - Hit or Box objects to the beat, dodge obstacles. Enhance strength, endurance, coordination, reflexes. Dance to the Rhythm and Elevate in a virtual world. This demo contains one playable level, three different stages, and three skins. Get a feel for the game!
